title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
General Considerations

The response must accurately describe the data.

For Task A, the response must correctly identify a year from the line graph when there was a decline in the percentage of federal election spending by outside groups.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe an overall trend in the data after 2010.

For Task C, the response must correctly develop conclusion as to why that overall trend described in part (B) occurred after 2010.

For Task D, the response must correctly explain how federal elections have changed based on the data presented in the line graph.
descriptions: The responses accomplish none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question. For a student to earn a point for C they must first earn the B point.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question. For a student to earn a point for C they must first earn the B point.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question. For a student to earn a point for C they must first earn the B point.
